name: Adventuring Party Management Simulator
description:
The forces of evil threaten the land, and only you and your plucky band of heroes can save the day! But plucky heroism doesn't come cheap. Healing potions, on-the-job-training, hiring new recruits, resurrecting dead ones, it all costs money, and you've got your bottom line to think about.

Created for Ludum Dare game jam 41.

Controls: Mouse or arrow keys to move, mouse to use menus.
M to mute / unmute music.
